root.name: Blue Skies
root.description: OverviewBlue Skies is a top down perspective shooter developed by Rocking Pocket Games for iOS and PlayStation Mobile. It tasks the player, a new recruit at the Blue Skies Air Force Academy, with using a helicopter to stop the invading forces of the evil Hans Kraven. The game features 30 levels, a weapon upgrade system, 3 difficulty levels, and a randomly generated Arcade Mode for unlimited play.

similar_games.game: Desert Strike: Return to the Gulf
